verses.verse: וַיְהִ֡י <S%H1961><s%> become בְּאַרְבַּע֩ <S%H702><s%> four עֶשְׂרֵ֨ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָ֜ה <S%H8141><s%> year לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king חִזְקִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah עָלָ֞ה <S%H5927><s%> came up סַנְחֵרִ֤יב <S%H5576><s%> [that] Sennacherib מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king אַשּׁוּר֙ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵ֧י <S%H5892><s%> cities יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הַבְּצֻר֖וֹת <S%H1219><s%> against all the defenced וַֽיִּתְפְּשֵֽׂם׃ <S%H8610><s%> and took

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אַשּׁ֣וּר ׀ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רַב־ שָׁקֵ֨ה <S%H7262><s%> Rabshakeh מִלָּכִ֧ישׁ <S%H3923><s%> from Lachish יְרוּשָׁלְַ֛מָה <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto king חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah בְּחֵ֣יל <S%H2426><s%> army כָּבֵ֑ד <S%H3515><s%> with a great וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֗ד <S%H5975><s%> And he stood בִּתְעָלַת֙ <S%H8585><s%> by the conduit הַבְּרֵכָ֣ה <S%H1295><s%> pool הָעֶלְיוֹנָ֔ה <S%H5945><s%> of the upper בִּמְסִלַּ֖ת <S%H4546><s%> in the highway שְׂדֵ֥ה <S%H7704><s%> field כוֹבֵֽס׃ <S%H3526><s%> of the fuller's

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> Then came forth אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> then אֶלְיָקִ֥ים <S%H471><s%> unto him Eliakim בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son חִלְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2518><s%> Hilkiah's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> was over הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> which was over the house וְשֶׁבְנָא֙ <S%H7644><s%> and Shebna הַסֹּפֵ֔ר <S%H5608><s%> the scribe וְיוֹאָ֥ח <S%H3098><s%> and Joah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אָסָ֖ף <S%H623><s%> Asaph's הַמַּזְכִּֽיר׃ <S%H2142><s%> the recorder

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> about רַב־ שָׁקֵ֔ה <S%H7262><s%> And Rabshakeh אִמְרוּ־ <S%H559><s%> unto them Say נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> now אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חִזְקִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H2396><s%> ye now to Hezekiah כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king הַגָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> the great מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria מָ֧ה <S%H4100><s%> What הַבִּטָּח֛וֹן <S%H986><s%> What confidence הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> is this אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּטָֽחְתָּ׃ <S%H982><s%> [is] this wherein thou trustest

אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H559><s%> I say אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> are only דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> act שְׂפָתַ֔יִם <S%H8193><s%> [sayest thou] (but [they are but] vain עֵצָ֥ה <S%H6098><s%> your counsel וּגְבוּרָ֖ה <S%H1369><s%> and strength לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> for war עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> henceforth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> whom בָטַ֔חְתָּ <S%H982><s%> now on whom dost thou trust כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that מָרַ֖דְתָּ <S%H4775><s%> that thou rebellest בִּֽי׃

הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold בָטַ֡חְתָּ <S%H982><s%> Lo thou trustest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִשְׁעֶנֶת֩ <S%H4938><s%> in the staff הַקָּנֶ֨ה <S%H7070><s%> reed הָרָצ֤וּץ <S%H7533><s%> of this broken הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> of this עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> on Egypt אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יִסָּמֵ֥ךְ <S%H5564><s%> lean אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> whereon if a man עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and וּבָ֥א <S%H935><s%> it will go בְכַפּ֖וֹ <S%H3709><s%> into his hand וּנְקָבָ֑הּ <S%H5344><s%> and pierce כֵּ֚ן <S%H3651><s%> So פַּרְעֹ֣ה <S%H6547><s%> it so [is] Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לְכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַבֹּטְחִ֖ים <S%H982><s%> to all that trust עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> But

וְכִי־ <S%H3588><s%> if תֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> But if thou say אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God בָּטָ֑חְנוּ <S%H982><s%> to me We trust הֲלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after הֵסִ֤יר <S%H5493><s%> hath taken away חִזְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּמֹתָ֣יו <S%H1116><s%> [is it] not he whose high places וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבְּחֹתָ֔יו <S%H4196><s%> and whose altars וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לִֽיהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> to Judah וְלִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> and to Jerusalem לִפְנֵ֛י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמִּזְבֵּ֥חַ <S%H4196><s%> altars הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this תִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוֽוּ׃ <S%H7812><s%> Ye shall worship

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now הִתְעָ֣רֶב <S%H6148><s%> Now therefore give pledges נָ֔א <S%H4994><s%> come אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אֲדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> I pray thee to my master הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria וְאֶתְּנָ֤ה <S%H5414><s%> and I will give לְךָ֙ אַלְפַּ֣יִם <S%H505><s%> thee two thousand סוּסִ֔ים <S%H5483><s%> horses אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if תּוּכַ֕ל <S%H3201><s%> if thou be able לָ֥תֶת <S%H5414><s%> on thy part to set לְךָ֖ רֹכְבִ֥ים <S%H7392><s%> riders עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וְאֵ֣יךְ <S%H349><s%> How תָּשִׁ֗יב <S%H7725><s%> How then wilt thou turn away אֵ֠ת <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> the face פַחַ֥ת <S%H6346><s%> captain אַחַ֛ד <S%H259><s%> of one עַבְדֵ֥י <S%H5650><s%> servants אֲדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> of my master's הַקְטַנִּ֑ים <S%H6996><s%> of the least וַתִּבְטַ֤ח <S%H982><s%> and put thy trust לְךָ֙ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> on Egypt לְרֶ֖כֶב <S%H7393><s%> for chariots וּלְפָרָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6571><s%> horseman

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> now הֲמִבַּלְעֲדֵ֣י <S%H1107><s%> without יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עָלִ֛יתִי <S%H5927><s%> And am I now come up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> against this land הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לְהַשְׁחִיתָ֑הּ <S%H7843><s%> to destroy יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> it? the LORD אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> against עֲלֵ֛ה <S%H5927><s%> unto me Go up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> against this land הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְהַשְׁחִיתָֽהּ׃ <S%H7843><s%> and destroy

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֶלְיָקִים֩ <S%H471><s%> Eliakim וְשֶׁבְנָ֨א <S%H7644><s%> and Shebna וְיוֹאָ֜ח <S%H3098><s%> and Joah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about רַב־ שָׁקֵ֗ה <S%H7262><s%> unto Rabshakeh דַּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> Speak נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> now אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> I pray thee unto thy servants אֲרָמִ֔ית <S%H762><s%> in the Syrian language כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for שֹׁמְעִ֖ים <S%H8085><s%> for we understand אֲנָ֑חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> ourselves וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> [it] and speak אֵלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H413><s%> with יְהוּדִ֔ית <S%H3066><s%> not to us in the Jews' language בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <S%H241><s%> in the ears הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> are on הַחוֹמָֽה׃ <S%H2346><s%> that [are] on the wall

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said רַב־ שָׁקֵ֗ה <S%H7262><s%> But Rabshakeh הַאֶ֨ל <S%H413><s%> about אֲדֹנֶ֤יךָ <S%H113><s%> Hath my master וְאֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> about שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <S%H7971><s%> sent אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> me to thy master לְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> and to thee to speak אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these הֲלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> not הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H376><s%> to the men הַיֹּֽשְׁבִים֙ <S%H3427><s%> that sit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַ֣חוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> upon the wall לֶאֱכֹ֣ל <S%H398><s%> that they may eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [חַרְאֵיהֶם כ] (צֹואָתָ֗ם <S%H2716><s%> dung ק) וְלִשְׁתּ֛וֹת <S%H8354><s%> and drink אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [שֵׁינֵיהֶם כ] (מֵימֵ֥י ק) (רַגְלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H7890><s%> waste ק) עִמָּכֶֽם׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וַֽיַּעֲמֹד֙ <S%H5975><s%> stood רַב־ שָׁקֵ֔ה <S%H7262><s%> Then Rabshakeh וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and cried בְקוֹל־ <S%H6963><s%> voice גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> with a loud יְהוּדִ֑ית <S%H3066><s%> in the Jews' language וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said שִׁמְע֗וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֛י <S%H1697><s%> ye the words הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> of the great מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יַשִּׁ֥א <S%H5377><s%> deceive לָכֶ֖ם חִזְקִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Let not Hezekiah כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> you for he shall not be able לְהַצִּ֥יל <S%H5337><s%> to deliver אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor יַבְטַ֨ח <S%H982><s%> make you trust אֶתְכֶ֤ם <S%H853><s%> חִזְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H2396><s%> Neither let Hezekiah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying הַצֵּ֥ל <S%H5337><s%> will surely יַצִּילֵ֖נוּ <S%H5337><s%> deliver יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not תִנָּתֵן֙ <S%H5414><s%> shall not be delivered הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> us this city הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> into בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> into the hand מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria

אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hearken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about חִזְקִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H2396><s%> not to Hezekiah ס כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for כֹ֨ה <S%H3541><s%> such אָמַ֜ר <S%H559><s%> for thus saith הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אַשּׁ֗וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria עֲשֽׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> Make אִתִּ֤י <S%H854><s%> for בְרָכָה֙ <S%H1293><s%> [an agreement] with me [by] a present וּצְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> and come out אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to וְאִכְל֤וּ <S%H398><s%> to me and eat אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> ye every one גַּפְנוֹ֙ <S%H1612><s%> of his vine וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and every one תְּאֵנָת֔וֹ <S%H8384><s%> of his fig tree וּשְׁת֖וּ <S%H8354><s%> and drink אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ye every one מֵי־ <S%H4325><s%> the waters בוֹרֽוֹ׃ <S%H953><s%> of his own cistern
